about_the_game:
Embark on an epic journey in a story-rich action-adventure that seamlessly blends heart-pounding parkouring and traversal with a gripping narrative. As a young protagonist discovering their latent magical potential through the mystical Everseed, you must save society from a hidden threat.

Dive deep into a captivating coming-of-age story, that will shape your destiny. Unearth the secrets of the Everseed, a powerful artifact that unlocks your magical prowess, enabling you to wield extraordinary abilities. Traverse stunning landscapes with parkour, scale towering structures and navigating intricate environments as you strive to uncover the truth.

But beware, as the shadows conceal not only the external threat but also the betrayal of those closest to you. Navigate through a web of deceit and alliances, testing your resolve as you grapple with the challenges of trust and loyalty. Uncover the layers of a narrative that weaves a tale of magic, friendship, and the responsibilities that come with newfound powers.


Explore a magical world of ancient temples and perilous forests using parkour


Learn about the world and study magic to solve puzzles



Immerse yourself in a compelling coming-of-age story filled with twists, turns, and unexpected betrayals.



Harness the power of the Everseed to unlock your magical potential, allowing you to unleash awe-inspiring abilities.
Use them to change the world with magic and adapt your environment.



Go on an unforgettable journey where your actions will determine the fate of society. Will you rise to the occasion and become the savior society needs, or will the shadows consume everything you hold dear? Unveil the truth, unlock your potential, and confront the hidden threats.

name: Adaptive Hero

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: Dual core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB VRAM (e.g. GT1030)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Quad core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GB VRAM (eg. R7 260X, GT 730)

short_description: Unleash your inner hero in this thrilling action-adventure! Leap, climb, and swing through untamed wilderness, uncovering hidden paths and ancient temples. Discover the fate of your missing father, unravel the mysteries of an ancient cult, and unveil the society's secret before it crumbles.
